Sentencas: Modern low energy ion scattering (LEIS) can provide new information on the atomic composition of both outermost surface and sub-surface layers.
Titulo: Insight in the outside: materials science at the atomic level using LEIS

Sentencas: The wide scope of new possibilities is illustrated with results on ceramics, polymers and ultra-thin layers.
Titulo: Insight in the outside: materials science at the atomic level using LEIS

Sentencas: Most of the results presented are difficult or even impossible to obtain otherwise.
Titulo: Insight in the outside: materials science at the atomic level using LEIS

Sentencas: The combination of LEIS and isotopic oxygen exchange reactions was used to investigate the surface of yttria stabilised zirconia (YSZ) that is used in the solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Insight in the outside: materials science at the atomic level using LEIS

Sentencas: It is found that under working conditions the surface is covered by a monolayer of contamination, followed by an yttria segregated layer.
Titulo: Insight in the outside: materials science at the atomic level using LEIS

Sentencas: The quantification of LEIS is demonstrated for fluorinated self-assembled monolayers, while also the conformation of the endgroups is determined.
Titulo: Insight in the outside: materials science at the atomic level using LEIS

Sentencas: The use of LEIS to follow the growth of ultra-thin layers is discussed for a TiN barrier layer on silicon.
Titulo: Insight in the outside: materials science at the atomic level using LEIS
